text:
Apache2 service refuses to start and the service manager writes the following 
into the application log.

Cannot load C:/php/sapi/php4apache2.dll into server: The specified procedure 
could not be found.

This seems to be a problem that has been kicking around at the php web site and 
other places for as long as Apache2 has been available, yet there doesn't seem 
to be any fix for it.  I've tried every jury rig these people at php suggest, 
to no avail.  I am quite disheartened, believing that php and apache were blood 
brothers and would surely not have a problem such as this, or would at least 
have a well publicized fix.
creator: drpetes@swbell.net
nd@perlig.de
text:
Sorry, but there is nothing we can do here. If we _could_ we would. If the
official PHP version doesn't work, it often helps to take a current snapshot
from the PHP site.

Thanks for using Apache.
